name: Eudora (Edevjogos)
description:
Story:

The poor citizens of Eudora suffer with the overly priced water, to help them you’re trying to bring water back from a far way oasis back to the city, but the merchants and nobles responsible for selling water do not want the people getting it for free, so they hired a group of mercenaries that will try to destabilize your ship and make you loose all the water you’re carrying.

Don’t let your ship go unstable and bring water back to save the people of Eudora.

Music By Bertsz:

https://freesound.org/people/Bertsz/

Commands:

[A][D] - Move Character.

[S] - Throw the stair and go down automaticaly.

[W] - Move up the stair and stop descent.

[E]  - Remove box weight, Pick/Drop water barrels.
